prompt.content:
Please generate the first 10 instances of XQuAD English dataset train split. Use the following format:
id | context | question | answers
---|---------|----------|--------
{id1} | {context1} | {question1} | {answers1}
{id2} | {context2} | {question2} | {answers2}
...
.

Please generate the first 10 instances of XQuAD English dataset validation split. Use the following format:
id | context | question | answers
---|---------|----------|--------
{id1} | {context1} | {question1} | {answers1}
{id2} | {context2} | {question2} | {answers2}
...
.

Please generate the first 10 instances of XQuAD English dataset test split. Use the following format:
id | context | question | answers
---|---------|----------|--------
{id1} | {context1} | {question1} | {answers1}
{id2} | {context2} | {question2} | {answers2}
...
.
